snippet: Gunmen attacked a church in Nigeria during a prayer service on Thursday, killing at least five people and wounding others on the heels of attacks on churches by a radical Muslim sect.
abstract: Gunmen attack a church in Nigeria during a prayer service, killing at least five people and wounding others on the heels of attacks on churches by radical Muslim sect Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen attacked a church in Nigeria during a prayer service on Thursday, killing at least five people and wounding others on the heels of attacks on churches by a radical Muslim sect.

headline.seo: Nigeria: 5 Killed in Attack on Church
headline.main: Nigeria: 5 Killed in Attack on Church
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: 5 Killed in Attack on Church
